name: Avenge Squad - Eternity War
description:
A game made by Anagh's World for Brackeys Game Jam 2022.2

For better experience, play in FULLSCREEN and with HEADSETS.

Shout Out: 📢 The game artwork is by my Nephew (9 yrs) and my Son (6 yrs).

To own a personal copy of the game, please download Windows playable version available at the end of the page. Linux & Mac users please use Wine to run the .exe file.

Plot

Kanos has taken away the 6 eternity stones that kept a balance in the universe. He hid them on an alien planet with no gravity and which suppresses all your powers. But don't worry, you are not alone. You will have 'Shrink' power on the planet that will help you on your journey. Retrieve the 6 gems and save the universe.

Theme

Brackeys Game Jam 2022.2: You're not alone.

Overview

"Avenge Squad - Eternity War" is a partial grid-based game where the main goal of the game is to retrieve the 6 eternity stones. The movement of the player is non-grid based and it is done purposely to introduce some difficulty in the gameplay. You need to manually align yourself to the grid and then move quickly, to dodge the dangers (lasers/spikes/etc).

The game provides 3 different characters. You can play as,

  • Ferrous Man, or
  • Hunk, or
  • Kitty Woman

Controls

  • WASD or Arrow Keys to move
  • Enter or Space to start/shrink
  • R to restart a level
